sense.def:
Kadar položaj ali dogodek opišemo kot
monstrous
, hočemo reči, da je pretresljiv ali nepravičen.

seg.quote: The court's judgement was absolutely monstrous.

sense.def:
Kar je
monstrous
, je zelo veliko in precej grdo ali šokantno.

seg.quote: ...a heavy man in a monstrous mustard-coloured sweater.
